headline: account.wacom.com
shortDescription: Website to register products, redeem software, and update profile information.
longDescription: Website to register products, redeem software, and update profile information. I was tech lead, designed the workflow for sign in/sign up, built most components, integrated components with a CMS, handled data privacy for accounts.

headline: Spotiguess
shortDescription: Android app using Spotify API to get a random song, play a preview, and have the user guess from 4 choices which song it is.
longDescription: Android app using Spotify API to get a random song, play a preview, and have the user guess from 4 choices which song it is. Team of 4 designed and built in 2 weeks. I was responsible for the overall design, API calls, and settings (Java).

headline: developer.wacom.com
shortDescription: Developer site showcasing different APIs and SDKs that Wacom has to offer.
longDescription: Developer site showcasing different APIs and SDKs that Wacom has to offer. I was tech lead, built most of the components, and integrated components with a CMS.

headline: Teslar
shortDescription: Web App made to mimic the official Tesla application. App offers control of the car such as turning on and off the Tesla, starting the car, media and climate controls, and summoning.
longDescription: Web App made to mimic the official Tesla application. App offers control of the car such as turning on and off the Tesla, starting the car, media and climate controls, and summoning. Team of 5 designed and built over the course of 9 months. I was the team captain, led design and implementation, handled all front end work (HTML, SASS, JavaScript), and some API calls (NodeJS).

headline: Creative Enterprise
shortDescription: Website to showcase the uses of Wacom tablets in a business to business scenario.
longDescription: Website to showcase the uses of Wacom tablets in a business to business scenario. I built many components and integrated components with a CMS.
